mapper.select: SELECT s.employee_id ,e.name ,t.clock_in ,t.clock_out ,SUBTIME(t.clock_out,t.clock_in) AS work_time FROM shift_schedules AS s LEFT JOIN time_records AS t ON s.date=t.date AND s.employee_id=t.employee_id INNER JOIN employees AS e ON s.employee_id = e.id WHERE s.date = #{date} ;
SELECT s.employee_id as employeeId ,e.name FROM employees AS e INNER JOIN shift_schedules AS s ON e.id = s.employee_id WHERE employee_id = #{employeeId} AND date = CURRENT_DATE ;
SELECT clock_in AS clockIn ,clock_out AS clockOut FROM time_records WHERE employee_id = #{employeeId} AND date = CURRENT_DATE ;
mapper.update: INSERT INTO time_records(date, employee_id, clock_in, created_at, updated_at) VALUE (CURRENT_DATE ,#{employeeId} ,CURRENT_TIME, now(), now()) ;
UPDATE time_records SET clock_out=CURRENT_TIME WHERE employee_id = #{employeeId} AND date = CURRENT_DATE ;
